text:
COLIN JAMES McDONALD
PERSONAL SUMMARY:
A highly motivated self-starter with considerable aptitude and enthusiasm for analytical study of data and reporting. Ability to work either solo or as part of a team and to achieve highly detailed and accurate results under strict time constraints. High level of proficiency and competency with numerous software packages including MS Excel & Access, SAP, Oracle, Kildrummy Cost Manager and JDE E1. Extensive experience in developing and maintaining bespoke reports, registers and dashboards.
CAREER SUMMARY:
Successfully managing international infrastructure projects with a multidisciplinary approach interfacing with multinational stakeholders
Substantial pre-contract and estimating work with Sakhalin Technical Services Network (joint venture between Wood COLIN JAMES McDONALD
PERSONAL SUMMARY:
A highly motivated self-starter with considerable aptitude and enthusiasm for analytical study of data and reporting. Ability to work either solo or as part of a team and to achieve highly detailed and accurate results under strict time constraints. High level of proficiency and competency with numerous software packages including MS Excel & Access, SAP, Oracle, Kildrummy Cost Manager and JDE E1. Extensive experience in developing and maintaining bespoke reports, registers and dashboards.
CAREER SUMMARY:
Successfully managing international infrastructure projects with a multidisciplinary approach interfacing with multinational stakeholders
Substantial pre-contract and estimating work with Sakhalin Technical Services Network (joint venture between Wood Group PSN and local Sakhalin Island Contractor) including Preparation of Invitation to Tender documentation; Analysis of tenderers bids and Preparation of contract documentation including drafting of Work Packages.
Ahmed Mansoor Al A'ali (2007-2008) - Country Commercial Manager during expansion into new territory (Qatar)
Managed a number of major multi-million pound projects in a various worldwide locations including Ghana, Bahrain and Sakhalin Island.
First Engineering (2002 to 2005) - Seconded to Romford office primarily to assist in and laterally coordinate review of final accounting procedure of £74M Structures Framework Contract. Further to review devised new procedure & coordinated implementation to successful conclusion.
CAREER HISTORY:
BAM Nuttall Rail
Shell Gabon
Chevron Corporation - TCO (Tengizchevroil)
Rigmar Services Ltd.
Nigerdock PLC
Petrofac
Production Services Network (PSN)
Aker Solutions Ltd
Ahmed Mansoor Al-A’ali Co. BSC (c)
Taysec Construction Ltd
First Engineering Ltd
Morrison Construction
University of Abertay
Previous Career History available on request
IT SKILLS:
MS Word
MS Excel
CCS Estimating Software
SAP Management Software
Kildrummy Cost Manager
JDE E1 Enterprise
P6 Primavera
Synchro 4D Construction Project Management Software

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
